= Introduction =
  This project is created to host some useful programs for Linux, Windows, Symbian. The implement language is Python.

= Contents =
  * [wxPKUIPGW]: A client to login IP gateway of Peking University.
  * [pkuIPGW]:  A Symbian client to login IP gateway of Peking University.
  * [gCalSync]: A Symbian tool to upload Symbian Calendar Event to Google Calendar.
  * [DateDuration]: A Symbian program to calculate days between two dates.
  * [WindowsTime]: A tool to show how long a windows has been installed.(Windows Only)

= Dependency =
  The programs for Symbian are developed at pys60 version 1.9.x. You can download it from [https://garage.maemo.org/projects/pys60/]. You can also download the .sis files needed from [http://code.google.com/p/pytoolkits/downloads/list Downloads]
